text: Lower Merion Township is a township in Montgomery County, Pennsylvania and part of the Philadelphia Main Line. As of the 2020 U.S. Census, the township had a total population of 63,633. Lower Merion has the 5th highest per-capita income and the 12th highest median household income in the country with a population of 50,000 or more.https://www.census.gov/quickfacts/table/INC910214/4209144976,00 ==References== Category:Townships in Pennsylvania
title: Lower Merion Township, Pennsylvania
